title: Government Blinding Sex Offenders
keywords: blindness blind eyesight sight vision eye eyes latest drug drugs pharmaceutical pharmaceuticals Viagra side-effect Viagra side-effects Viagra side effect Viagra side effects sexuality erectile dysfunction sex medication medications pill pills sex offender sex offenders health medicine medical Cartoonist Group Creators Syndicate Akron Beacon-Journal
caption: Medicaid has been providing Viagra for sex offenders.  Reports have linked Viagra to blindness.  What's the latest.  The government's trying to blind sex offenders.
